articles.title: Super Plus: AirAsia offers unlimited free flights within ASEAN and free food delivery for RM639 - SoyaCincau.com
articles.description: AirAsia has launched Super+, its one-year unlimited pass which offers unlimited free flights within ASEAN with covid coverage and free food delivery. Only 200,000 passes are up for grabs at RM639 each.
articles.content: Ahead of the reopening of Malaysia’s international borders, AirAsia has launched Super+, its new unlimited subscription service which offers unlimited flights with COVID-19 insurance coverage and fre… [+2905 chars]

articles.title: Oscars 2022: Troy Kotsur wins best supporting actor for CODA - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description:
LOS ANGELES, March 27 : Troy Kotsur became the first deaf man to win an Oscar, taking the Academy Award on Sunday for best supporting actor for his role as a fisherman and father in family drama "CODA."

Kotsur, 53, has worked for over three decades in thea…
